page.title: 10BUSTON FARM,KINGS SUTTON.
page.content: {CROPS}OF THE 460 ACRES THIS YEAR 270 WERE USED FOR CROPS,AS FOLLOWS: WHEAT 140 ACRES BARLEY 80 ACRES OIL SEED RAPE 50 ACRES CROPS ARE ROTATED IN THE ORDER 1 YR OIL SEED RAPE,2 YRS WHEAT,2YRS BARLEY.SOME OF THE STRAW FROM THE CROPS IS BAILED FOR USE IN THE WINTER AS THE COWS ARE IN THE BARNS.{PERMANENT GRASS}THE 190 ACRES OF GRASS ARE USED FOR GRAZING(IN SUMMER),HAY AND SILAGE.OVER ALL ABOUT 10 ACRES IS LOST IN ROADS AND TRACKS. {MACHINERY}1 COMBINE HARVESTER,1 LAND ROVER AND 5 TRACTORS. {EMPLOYEES}2 FULL TIME EMPLOYEES WORK 9AM TILL 5 PM WITH OVER TIME AT BUSY PERIODS.THEY LIVE AT BUSTON LODGE AND THE ADJOINING COTTAGE,WHICH ARE AT THE END OF THE DRIVE LEADING TO THE FARM.
